text: Aegires lagrifaensis is a species of sea slug, a nudibranch, a marine, opisthobranch gastropod mollusc in the family Aegiridae.Bouchet, P. (2015). Aegires lagrifaensis Ortea, Moro & Espinosa, 2015. In: MolluscaBase (2017). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species on 2017-04-24. ==Distribution== This species was described from Cuba. ==References== Category:Aegiridae Category:Gastropods described in 2015
title: Aegires lagrifaensis
